title: STA-TCN: Neural Decoder for Upper Limb Rehabilitation
image: figures/STA-TCN Neural Decoder for Upper Limb Rehabilitation.png
description: Deep learning architecture for continuous motion prediction using surface electromyography (sEMG) signals. Implements Spatio-Temporal Attention and lightweight Temporal Convolutional Network for subject-independent, real-time estimation of elbow joint angles in cable-driven exoskeletons.

title: Robotic Catheter System for Cardiac Ablation
image: figures/Robotic Catheter System for Cardiac Ablation.png
description: Advanced robot-assisted catheter ablation system for cardiac procedures. Features IMU-based dynamic pose tracking for real-time C-arm movement monitoring and motor-based haptic force feedback system for enhanced precision and safety in atrial fibrillation treatments.

title: RRT Motion Planner
description: Rapidly-Exploring Random Tree (RRT) algorithm implementation for robotic manipulator path planning. Capable of exploring high-dimensional configuration spaces and generating collision-free trajectories for 6-DOF robotic arms in complex environments.

title: Micro Vibration Robot
description: Vision-controlled vibrating robot platform using computer vision feedback for precise control. Implements real-time visual marker tracking and adaptive vibration pattern adjustment for remote exploration and manipulation tasks in constrained spaces.

title: Fynthesizer
description: Modular audio synthesizer with integrated oscillators, filters and envelope generators. Features microcontroller-based sequencing and parameter control for versatile sound generation and real-time signal processing capabilities.

title: Automated Analog IC Layout System
description: Automated layout generation tool for matched analog components in integrated circuits. Produces symmetrical placements and routings for resistors and capacitors to minimize device mismatch in precision analog modules like differential amplifiers and current mirrors.

title: EEG Cross-Subject Recognition Framework
description: Machine learning framework for cross-subject EEG signal classification. Implements domain adaptation techniques and attention mechanisms to improve generalization across different subjects for brain-computer interface applications.

title: Rehabilitation Robotics Control System
description: Real-time control system for upper limb rehabilitation robotics. Integrates biosignal processing, motion estimation, and adaptive control algorithms to provide personalized assistance during rehabilitation exercises.

title: Smart Home Automation Platform
description: IoT-based home automation system using Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Features voice control, automated lighting, temperature management, and energy monitoring with cross-platform mobile app for remote control and data visualization.

title: Machine Learning Model Optimizer
description: Automated hyperparameter tuning framework using Bayesian optimization for deep learning models. Reduces training time by 40% while improving model accuracy through intelligent exploration of the hyperparameter space.

title: Real-Time Object Detection System
description: Computer vision system for autonomous vehicle perception using YOLO architecture. Achieves 30 FPS real-time performance with custom-trained models on diverse driving scenarios including pedestrian detection and traffic sign recognition.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive healthcare data visualization platform built with D3.js. Provides real-time analytics and insights for patient monitoring, treatment outcomes, and resource allocation through intuitive charts and graphs.
